name: eStranged
description:
In eStranged, take control of a nameless child who finds himself in a strange world, with the ability to separate his soul to posses and take control of objects.

Created in 48 hours, the game includes 3 levels, and a variety of objects to posses and control, each with their own unique properties.

Collaborated with a team of 4. I was responsible for mechanics design and implementation, as well as level design and sound engineering.
